item.title: Apple Strikes WeChat Deal With Tencent, Will Earn 15% From Purchases In Mini Games, Apps: Report
item.description: The iPhone maker had demanded that Tencent fix the loopholes used by app makers to direct users to external payment services, circumventing the 30% ap...

item.title: Comcast’s NBCUniversal Revives NBCSN In Sports Cable Comeback: Report
item.description: According to the Wall Street Journal’s report, the new channel will serve as an extension of NBCU’s existing sports ecosystem.

item.title: Opendoor Falls Premarket After Four-Day Rally: Warrant Issue, Short-Squeeze Talk Fuel Bullish Retail Sentiment
item.description: Stocktwits sentiment for OPEN has remained in the ‘extremely bullish’ zone all week.

item.title: Why Is US Antimony Stock Falling Over 4% Premarket?
item.description: The company reported a loss of $0.04 per share for the quarter ended Sept. 30, while analysts expected a profit of $0.02 per share.

item.title: DLocal’s Strong Quarter Came With A Warning: Here’s What Spooked Investors
item.description: The firm took a hit after Mexico raised import tariffs on low-value packages from 19% to 33.5% in August, targeting shipments valued under $2,500.
